resources.string: Press the button for a delicious joke!

string-array.name: jokes
string-array.item: How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb? \n None – It’s a hardware problem
Why do programmers always mix up Halloween and Christmas? \n Because Oct 31 equals Dec 25.
There are only 10 kinds of people in this world: those who know binary and those who don’t.
A SQL query goes into a bar, walks up to two tables and asks, "Can I join you?"
Q: "Whats the object-oriented way to become wealthy?" \n A: Inheritance
To understand what recursion is, you must first understand recursion.
Why programmers like UNIX: \n unzip, strip, touch, finger, grep, mount, fsck, more, yes, fsck, fsck, fsck, umount, sleep
Why do Java programmers wear glasses? \n Because they don’t C#!
If you like infinite loop jokes, check this one out.
Q: What do you call a collection that has no methods and doesn’t do anything? \n A: A listless list
